subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Some French athletes said they would lobby the International Olympic Committee for permission to wear a badge saying “For a better world” at the Beijing Olympics, in response to China’s recent violent actions in Tibet. About 20 former and current French athletes attended an unveiling of the badge.
